name: Squat
description: A foundational squat that engages the quads, glutes, and core.

name: Lunge
description: A simple lunge targeting quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes.

name: Side Lunge
description: A lateral lunge targeting the quadriceps, inner thighs, and glutes.

name: Step Up
description: Works the quadriceps and glutes by stepping onto an elevated platform, enhancing lower body strength.

name: Leg Extension
description: An isolation exercise for strengthening the quadriceps using a leg extension machine.

name: Bulgarian Split Squat
description: A single-leg squat variation that isolates the quadriceps and glutes.

name: Leg Press
description: A machine-based exercise that targets the quadriceps, glutes, and hamstrings.
